page.title: 02LLANDERLO CONTINUED
page.content:
mixture of small shops, a church, chapels a doctors surgery, library, evening classes.
Arts and Crafts Most women sew and knit. Painting and tapestry are also included.
Attitudes-An earnest concern about the security of the information gained in this survey, Quote 'Census taken in Holland contained documentation of Jewish civilians which was taken over during the occupation by Nazis in WWII. The supervisor of the Water Works (67.22) complains of cuts in staffing during the past year. He fears that there may be problems ahead. There are complaints about the sudden swooping or ferocious speeds of RAF planes from training establishments in West Wales
